definition[0]: bad or dishonest behaviour by someone in a position of authority or trust
example[0]: a doctor who has been accused of professional misconduct
example[1]: He was fired for serious misconduct.
example[2]: She was found guilty of gross misconduct  (=very serious misconduct).
definition[1]: bad or dishonest behaviour by a professional person
example[3]: the penalties for such misconduct as fraudulent trading or theft
